share.title: Cap2Cal - AI Event Capture
share.text: Check out Cap2Cal! Turn any event poster into a calendar entry with AI.
share.appDescription: Easily add events to your calendar from photos!

errors.failedProcessSharedImage: Failed to process shared image. Please try again.

subscription.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
subscription.unknownError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dataManagement.reAuthRequired: Please log in again to delete your account

valueProp.title: Turn Everything into Calendar Events
valueProp.subtitle: Posters, flyers, social posts, invites, handwritten notes — we handle the rest

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Description: Take a photo or import anything with date information on it
howItWorks.step2Description: AI reads all details and saves the event in your app library
howItWorks.step3Description: Export to calendar, share events, buy tickets, and navigate to locations

tickets.title: Buy Tickets Instantly
tickets.subtitle: Never miss out on your favourite events. Find and purchase tickets directly from the app.
tickets.feature1: Search events near you with integrated ticket search
tickets.feature2: Compare prices across multiple vendors instantly
tickets.feature3: Secure checkout — book your spot in seconds

freeTrial.title: Ready to Get Started?
freeTrial.bullet3: Access tickets, share events, and navigate
freeTrial.permissionCamera: Camera — so you can snap events
freeTrial.permissionCalendar: Calendar — so we can save your events

getStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStarted.subtitle: Everything you need to never miss another event
getStarted.bullet3: Access tickets, share events, and navigate
getStarted.permissionCamera: Camera — so you can snap events
getStarted.permissionCalendar: Calendar — so we can save your events

cameraInstruction.title: Capture Date Information
cameraInstruction.description1: To help us accurately identify your events, please take a photo that clearly shows the date information.
cameraInstruction.description2: This could be a ticket, flyer, or any document containing the event date.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.description: We're constantly improving Cap2Cal. Your feedback helps us build a better app!

appLikePrompt.title: Are you enjoying cap2cal?
appLikePrompt.description: We'd love to hear your thoughts!

privacyConsent.title: Welcome to Capture2Calendar
privacyConsent.intro: We care about your privacy. Here's what you should know:
privacyConsent.imageProcessingDescription: Photos you capture are sent to Google's Gemini AI to extract event information. Images are not stored on our servers.
privacyConsent.analyticsDescription: We collect anonymous usage data to improve the app. You can disable this anytime in Settings.
privacyConsent.yourRightsDescription: You can export or delete all your data at any time from the Settings screen.

notCaptured.title: Couldn't Capture
notCaptured.generalAdvice: Oops! Couldn’t grab all the event details. Try a clearer picture — blurs or missing info can trip us up!

permissionDenied.title: Permission Needed
permissionDenied.cameraAdvice: We can't snap events without camera access. Grant permission in your settings to start capturing.
permissionDenied.calendarAdvice: We can't save events without calendar access. Grant permission in your settings to use this feature.
permissionDenied.photosAdvice: We can't import photos without library access. Grant permission in your settings to use this feature.

upgrade.title: Capture Limit Reached
upgrade.subtitle: You've used all your free captures

paywall.title: Never Miss an Event
paywall.subtitle: You've hit your free limit. Upgrade to capture unlimited events and never miss out!
paywall.benefit1: Unlimited event captures - never hit a limit again
paywall.benefit2: Priority AI processing - get results faster
paywall.benefit3: Advanced event detection - capture complex events
paywall.benefit4: Support indie development - help us build more features
paywall.testimonial: "This app saves me hours every week!" - Sarah, Pro User
paywall.legalText: Subscription auto-renews unless canceled. Cancel anytime in Settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.vibrationDescription: Haptic feedback for button presses and interactions
settings.analyticsDescription: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
settings.exportDataDescription: Export all your events as JSON
settings.clearStorageDescription: Delete all saved events from your device
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete all data and your account
settings.confirmClearStorageMessage: This will delete all saved events from your device. This action cannot be undone.
settings.confirmDeleteAccountMessage: This will permanently delete all your data and your account. This action cannot be undone.

phrase1.1: Just a moment, gathering all the details...
phrase1.3: Getting all the info ready for you!

phrase2.2: I'm on it, getting things ready...

phrase2.5: Hold tight, final touches coming up!
